CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Harvest stage positioned above or below the Delivered to Retail stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Harvest stage is positioned {above} the Delivered to Retail stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Processing?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Processing is {15395}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Packaged for Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Packaged for Distribution is {4605}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Harvest, with a value of {27041}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Delivered to Retail, with a value of {4127}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
SC.A: Decreased by {6813} Tons from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Harvest to stage Post-Processing?
SC.A: Decreased by {11646} Tons from stage Post-Harvest to stage Post-Processing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {3977} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 21218? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 11988? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {8582}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {4605}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {4127}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 4366 and 11988? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {8582}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {4605}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, or from stage Post-Harvest to Post-Processing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Harvest} to {Post-Processing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to {Packaged for Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Harvest} and {Post-Processing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
